name: One Side Two Side Red Side Blue Side
name_original: One Side Two Side Red Side Blue Side
description:
Made for the GM48 gamejam in 48 hours in July 2020.

https://gm48.net/game/1641/one-side-two-side-red-side-blue-side

One Side Two Side Red Side Blue Side

Get ready to pull your hair out as you try to conquer the game board. As you pass over tiles you will change their colour to your own. As your bullets pass over the tiles they do the same.

Collect Refills for your ammo - and keep your eyes out for the Supershot powerup! If you shoot the powerups you are in for a suprise!

Grab your controller or keyboard!

See if you can beat the Bot - or even go Head to Head with a friend!

  • [x] Full Controller Support
  • [x] Couch co-op!
  • [x] Immersive Sounds
  • [x] 2 Song soundtrack
  • [x] My kids liked it!
